content: your preferred short row heel in row 66 i need a mini-gusset for my socks with the flk heel continue in the round working 16 row with pattern on after 52 row i start the instep stitches and plain stockinette on the back of the leg shaping of the mini gusset kfb at each end of sole stitches in row 17 start with working patterning on instep stitches every 3rd row 4 times this gives me 64 row and 36 sole start working pattern on the back of the leg with the stitches in row 66 do the flk next row 1 heel on 2+1+9+12+9+1+2 stitches and continue in the knit to your preferred length minus about 1 inch in round i then get rid off the patterning ending with row 4 mini-gusset by decreasing by 1 on each side 4 times in every switch to size 2 25mm needle and work 12 row of 2x2 3rd row 12 row knit one ribbing row in established pattern 13 row bind off using your preferred stretchy bindoff method i knit 60 row weave in ends enjoy i very much like jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off jssbo http //www knitty com/issuefal l09/featjssbo php © la maison de saba 2018 slip_stitch lines page 2 of 2 v 2 1
